text: hi my name is Rebecca and in today's
lesson I'll explain the difference
between two commonly confused words so
and such alright let's have a look at
the board the word so should be used
with an adjective or an adverb
alright the word such should be used
with a noun it could be a singular noun
or a plural noun but it should be used
with a noun and I'm going to give you
some examples so you understand exactly
how it works it's really quite simple so
stay with me and I think you can master
this in no time
alright so we should be saying he's so
tall right he's so tall or he's such a
tall man alright see the difference so
plus the adjective such plus the now now
here because it's a singular noun we had
to add the word a alright you'll see
later that we don't need you let's take
another example it's so hot or it's such
a hot day
alright another one that store is so
expensive or it's such an expensive shop
alright what you don't want to say is
it's so expensive shop that you can't
say because you need to say such an
expensive shop or just so expensive
alright another example that cake is so
delicious or that's such a delicious
cake
right see the difference
quite different quite different another
one it's they are so friendly or they
are such friendly people all right now
here also it's such plus a noun but this
time we don't need to say such a
friendly people we just say such
friendly people next one that apartment
is so luxurious or those are such
luxurious apartments what does the word
luxurious mean it has a lot of luxury
it's very fancy
okay very spacious and so on luxurious
usually also expensive all right we can
also use so with adverbs so we could say
for example he runs so quickly she
speaks so slowly
he drives so carefully alright so you
can also use so with an adverb not just
with an adjective there are also a
couple of other expressions which you
should be familiar with it's been so
long since I've seen you
right it's been so long that means a
long time went by since I last saw you
it's been so long since we last met or
it's been such a long time since we last
met so again here we have to add such
plus a noun another example to keep in
mind we say so much or so many for
example we have so much time before our
flight or we have so many hours before
our flight right or we have such a lot
of time before our flight all right so I
hope you see the difference between so
and such when I come back you'll have a
chance to do a little exercise to see
how well you
these points now let me ask you why do
you think we use the words so and such
why can't we just say it's hot why do we
need to say it's so hot what do you
think well it's because we want to
emphasize something right we could say
he's tall or we could say he's so tall
when we say he's so tall we are
emphasizing that he's really tall okay
we could say he's a tall man that's kind
of just a description or we could just
say he's such a tall man then again we
are emphasizing it so both these words
so and such are added when you want to
emphasize whatever you're saying okay
now let's do a little quiz to see if
you've understood which one to use all
right first one you look blank tired
what should it be you look so tired
or you look such tired should be so okay
because it says adjectives next he's
blanked a nice man he's blank a nice man
should it be he's so a nice man or he's
such a nice man which one
okay good next one Venice is blank a
lovely City
so a lovely City or such a lovely thing
what should we say
okay such a lovely city because we have
a noun at the end there she paints blank
beautifully so beautifully or such
beautifully so beautifully this time we
had an adverb next the food was blank
delicious the food was so delicious or
the food was such delicious I hope you
said so the mission next one and the
last one the hotel had blank comfortable
beds so comfortable beds or such
comfortable beds which one ok I hope you
got all those right if you'd like to do
some more practice on these two words so
and such please go to our website
wwlp.com you can do a quiz on this and
also look at videos and many other
topics in English alright thanks very
much for watching bye for now
